mapper.select: SELECT r.reseq, r.userid, r.cseq, r.people, r.classtime, r.classday, r.totalprice, r.payment, r.endedclass, p.title FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN product p ON r.cseq = p.cseq

SELECT r.reseq, r.userid, r.cseq, r.people, r.classtime, r.classday, r.totalprice, r.payment, r.endedclass, p.title FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN product p ON r.cseq = p.cseq WHERE r.endedclass = #{endedclass}
